title: Need a tank support
body: I play Thresh, Sona, Lulu, and Morgana but I want a more tanky support as well to add to my lineup, I tried Trundle, but it's hard to get to adcs to get assists, Alistar is very good disengage, but I really don't like how weak he is overall he's like a walking CC that's it, and a lousy undependable heal. I want to be able to be aggressive but still be able to protect my adc, I like Leona for that regard, tanky, great initiation, great cc, and has a strong kit design to protect my adc, problem is she costs 4800 blue essence and I only have 4100 :( and unlike the old system, I don't get blue essence every game, so it takes awhile to build up again.

Yeah but Taric is like Thresh good off-tank but he's not really a tank, I found Shen and only play 3 games with him and I like him he fits very well with my playstyle.

While he doesn't have the raw stats of a tank, he is still very tanky due to his constant heals and shields.  As a support, I often heal for more damage than I take as well as mitigate just as much, if not more damage than my top laner.  When I go top lane with him, I heal for quite a bit less due to mostly just healing myself but usually mitigate about 2 or 3 times the second most.  You may see Taric and think he only has 2500 HP and that he isn't all that tanky, but by time he dies he should easily shield at least 36% of his max life and heal for around 1k.  This means his actual effective HP in a lost fight should be around 4400 without his high resistances.
